title: Paramount Plus Schedule December 9-15 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added

Starting December 9, The Fabulous Four will be available on Paramount Plus. Directed by Jocelyn Moorhouse, it is an American comedy-drama. The film chronicles the adventures of a group of friends who studied at […] The post Paramount Plus Schedule December 9-15 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ritika Singh
excerpt: Paramount Plus' weekly schedule of movie and TV show releases for December 9-December 15 2024, is out for the loyal viewers.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Paramount Plus’ new TV and movie releases for December 9-15 2024 include The Fabulous Four and An Evening with Dua Lipa. Starting December 9, The Fabulous Four will be available on Paramount Plus. Directed by Jocelyn Moorhouse, it is an American comedy-drama. The film chronicles the adventures of a group of friends who studied at the same college. Their lives end up taking an interesting turn when they receive an invitation to be the bridesmaids at a college friend’s dream wedding. As the trip commences, things do not go as smoothly as they expected. While friendships are rekindled, the past returns for new revelations. Thus, the girls witness a journey of love, romance, friendships, drama, twists and turns. The star cast of The Fabulous Four features Susan Sarandon as Lou, Brandee Evans as Leslie, Bruce Greenwood as Ted, Megan Mullally as Alice, and many others in key roles. Further, on Sunday, December 15, An Evening with Dua Lipa drops on the streaming platform. Directed by Paul Dugdale, it is a TV special featuring the gorgeous singing sensation Dua Lipa. It showcases the three-time Grammy Award winner, performing at the Royal Albert Hall located in London. For the performance, the “Dance the Night” singer will be accompanied by none other than her band 53-piece Heritage Orchestra. Additionally, a choir will join the stage to put up a mesmerizing performance of the singer’s best chartbusters. Aside from Dua Lipa, the TV special will feature Elton John, recreating their popular duet “Cold Heart.” New Paramount Plus releases for December 9-15 2024 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Paramount Plus from December 9-15 2024. December 9 The Fabulous Four December 15 An Evening with Dua Lipa For more Paramount Plus content, check out the premiere date of Yellowstone’s prequel series 1923 Season 2. Also here is the trailer for Henry Danger: The Movie.
html:
Paramount Plus’ new TV and movie releases for December 9-15 2024 include The Fabulous Four and An Evening with Dua Lipa.

Starting December 9, The Fabulous Four will be available on Paramount Plus. Directed by Jocelyn Moorhouse, it is an American comedy-drama. The film chronicles the adventures of a group of friends who studied at the same college. Their lives end up taking an interesting turn when they receive an invitation to be the bridesmaids at a college friend’s dream wedding. As the trip commences, things do not go as smoothly as they expected. While friendships are rekindled, the past returns for new revelations. Thus, the girls witness a journey of love, romance, friendships, drama, twists and turns.

The star cast of The Fabulous Four features Susan Sarandon as Lou, Brandee Evans as Leslie, Bruce Greenwood as Ted, Megan Mullally as Alice, and many others in key roles.

Further, on Sunday, December 15, An Evening with Dua Lipa drops on the streaming platform. Directed by Paul Dugdale, it is a TV special featuring the gorgeous singing sensation Dua Lipa. It showcases the three-time Grammy Award winner, performing at the Royal Albert Hall located in London. For the performance, the “Dance the Night” singer will be accompanied by none other than her band 53-piece Heritage Orchestra. Additionally, a choir will join the stage to put up a mesmerizing performance of the singer’s best chartbusters.

Aside from Dua Lipa, the TV special will feature Elton John, recreating their popular duet “Cold Heart.”

New Paramount Plus releases for December 9-15 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Paramount Plus from December 9-15 2024.

December 9

  • The Fabulous Four

December 15

  • An Evening with Dua Lipa

For more Paramount Plus content, check out the premiere date of Yellowstone’s prequel series 1923 Season 2. Also here is the trailer for Henry Danger: The Movie.
